reviewText: I'm not really familiar with the Scanners mythology. I bought this because I was blown away by Liliana Komorowska's guest role as Mara in the Highlander series and I wanted to see more of her. She does not disappoint. She makes a terrific villainess, and clearly relishes the role. "La belle Dame sans merci," indeed. She really makes the movie, and since she's on-screen much of the time, that works out fine.

Cronenberg at his finest. I saw this movie when i was about 9 or 10, it was a tape.

There are a lot of good shots here, especially the main city of Montreal where the BNP buildings are.
One of my favorites from the scanner collection!!!!! Never disappoints....love it!!!!!!!!!!!
The scanners series has been a personal favorite over the years - so I pretty basis, wish they get Scanner Cop :)
i absolutely loved this movie, as well as all of the other movies in the scanner series! i wish there were more in the series!
